thread.section_title: Church Street Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: The worst stay
thread.title_full: The worst stay - Review of Church Street Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: inasahmed
title: The worst stay
text:
When I first checked in, the receptionist made a mistake and made me pay twice the whole price of the stay which I did not get the refund added to my balance yet because it is an international transaction, no breakfast, no kettle or tea in the room only in the communion room, the TV did not work properly. The toiletries were not replaced until I had to ask for it
The underground is not near.
At the check out I forgot the cash deposit of 20 pounds and nobody reminded me to take it.
In short the worst stay.
